title: Love Our Hair, Love Our Crown
description: ‘Love our Hair, Love our Crowns’ is about instilling self love and pride by virtue of appreciating the beautiful complexities in various textures of hair. The story is told through the lens of a 6 year old mixed race girl with interracial parents. The young protagonist expresses the love between herself and her parents, through the verbal affirmations she receives from her father about both herself and her mother’s hair.
author: Eva-Tatiana Siakam
